Name: 7 Girls War
About the game: A legend has been passed down for generations... When the world is in peril, seven heroes will come together and save the world. Play as Rolan, the uniting force that brings together these heroes of legend. Features: Classic RPG Experience Explore a Unique Fantasy World Turn-based Combat Open-ended Exploration Multiple Endings
